summary: This mod adds a new blade - Chastener's Reward
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00]Chastener's Reward[/color] Eng/Rus v1.0

[color=#ffff00]Author[/color]: Ronnie Magnum
[color=#ffff00]Requirements[/color]: Skyrim

This mod adds a new sword - Chastener's Reward - that deals an additional damage to bandits and strikes a bit faster than the ordinary one-handed sword. Can be upgraded with one corundum ingot.

To obtain this sword search for a small island southeast from Winterhold.

***

[color=#ffff00]!!!USE ONLY 1 ESP-FILE!!![/color]

***

[color=#ffff00]Also:[/color]
